txt.en: Defeat Angmarim at the Forges of Tham Mírdain.
Defeat Angmarim at the Forges of Tham Mírdain

Amarthiel brought many Angmarim with her to Tham Mírdain in an effort to secure the Ring-forges for her use. These scholars are there to uncover any knowledge that may aid the Iron Crown in throwing down Rivendell.
